page.title: 20Housing in Mabe
page.content: {Mabe}is a small village and has{5} estates three of which are privately owned and two that are council.One of the estates is called{Antron Way}which has{35}houses, the other two are called{Cunningham Park}and{Carnsew {Close.Carnsew Crescent}and{Gweal {Darras}are the council owned estates. The houses which are on the estates are fairly modern.The older cottages and houses of the village are mostly on the main roads which are called {Treliever Road}and{Antron Hill,}the other{Church Road.}There is an{Antron {Lane}and there are four houses there, one of these is now being pulled down. {Antron Hill}goes all the way up to another tiny little village called{ {Longdowns. }
